name: Skyhop
description:
A new space station is being built. But aliens have sabotaged the stations systems and it is flooded with acid. Can you find out the secret colour code to repair the systems of the space station and exile the aliens?

Be careful as you jump around on the scaffolding. The whole floor is covered with acid and the aliens might hide just around the corner, waiting to kill you.

If you encounter bugs please report them here: https://forms.gle/p4DpxsvwuH87GYXz5

If you have any other questions, contact the developer here: https://discord.gg/epnPJF2FHx
